description: This file sets up a knowledge base from a PDF URL, initializes an agent with a Perplexity model, and queries the agent for a response about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with a language model and a knowledge base to generate responses.

classes.name: Perplexity
classes.description: A language model class used for generating responses.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database class for storing and retrieving embeddings.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads or recreates the knowledge base from the specified URLs.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.
